item.name: 查询角色对应的接口权限
获取当前用户的权限信息
根据数据源类型id查询对应的参数模板
根据分类查询对应的数据源类型

body.raw:
{
    "typeId":"7",
    "enName":"test",
    "cnName":"测试表",
    "itemId":"22",
    "owner":"1",
    "databaseId":"2",
    "description":"测试11111",
    "lifeTime":1,
    "clusterId":1,
    "createMode":true,
    "fieldSql":"[{'name':'id','type':'int','size':'11','primaryKey':true,'comment':'字段id','location':'1','isNull':false},{'name':'name','type':'varchar','size':'24','comment':'字段name','location':'2','isNull':true},{'name':'date','type':'date','comment':'时间分区','location':'3','isNull':true}]"
}

{
    "typeId": "6",
    "enName": "test",
    "cnName": "测试表",
    "itemId": "20",
    "owner": "1",
    "databaseId": "1",
    "busDesc":"业务描述",
    "description": "测试11111",
    "lifeTime": 1,
    "clusterId": 1,
    "isExternal": false,
    "createMode": true,

    "fieldSql": "[{'name':'id','type':'int','comment':'字段id','location':'1','partition':'false'},{'name':'name','type':'string','comment':'字段name','location':'2','partition':false},{'name':'date1','type':'string','comment':'时间分区','location':'3','partition':true}]"
}
